name: BaselineGridRelativeOption
shortdesc: The zero point for the baseline grid offset.

property.name: TOP_OF_PAGE_OF_BASELINE_GRID_RELATIVE_OPTION
property.shortdesc: The baseline grid offset zero point is at the top of the page.

property.name: TOP_OF_MARGIN_OF_BASELINE_GRID_RELATIVE_OPTION
property.shortdesc: The baseline grid offset zero point is at the top page margin.
